## Command and Military Police
These rules also apply to any individual who is a MP/Command role (unless they are a member of a hostile force).\n[italic]Command roles are defined as; all heads, cic staff, mp, and squad leaders.[/italic]
- [textlink="Command and MP must follow Marine Law." link="RMCMarineLaw"] - [textlink="Command and MP are held to a higher standard of play." link="RMCHigherStandards"] - MP should try to remain non-lethal except in specific special circumstances. MP will be expected to answer for use of lethal force. - MP to the best of their ability should be investigating reports of crimes. - Only a whitelisted CO or Provost may pardon a sentence, but appeals can be done. See marine law. - The goal of [color=#ff000d][bold]MP[/bold][/color] is to make the server a more immersive and enjoyable place for everyone. Do your best to uphold that goal, by mediating conflicts and assisting the crew and marines with their needs with the minimal force required. - If your behavior in the Military Police role does not meet community standards, you may be subject to a roleban. This may not be an indication of a bad player, but it is an indication that a player doesn't have the understanding required to play MP.
